attributes.action: The Government must reverse austerity cuts to the Legal Aid system.
attributes.background: Further cuts announced can only destroy a system that is already on its knees and on the brink of total collapse

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

No further cuts have been announced, so we're not sure exactly what you mean by reverse the austerity cuts. If you would like the Government to reverse the changes made to legal aid since 2012, you could start a new petition asking for that to happen. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
